mapper.select: SELECT co.id, co.contract_amount_tax as price_tax, co.prod_name, co.prod_id, co.qty, co.prod_brand, co.prod_spec_type, co.unit_id, co.pay_rate - ppad.contract_amount_tax as has_contract_amount_tax, ppad.bill_detail_id, ppad.no, ppad.send_time, ppad.plan_lead_time, ppad.contract_amount_tax, ppad.contract_amount_tax as pay_apply_amount, ppad.pay_rate, ppad.pay_type FROM pur_pay_apply_detail ppad left join contract_object_qty co on ppad.bill_detail_id = co.id WHERE ppad.apply_id = #{mainId} and ppad.del_flag = '0'
